name: Fishter
description:
A game that has been in development for since 15.5.2020.

But due to personal stuff the games development has been on pause until 14.02.2021 

And i am now starting the development again!!!

This is my first time making anything using unity so give me some slack. :)

I dont have any ending currently planned for the game so... You might just be the guy who changes the direction of the game....

suggestions and ideas welcome

Roadmap: https://trello.com/b/7gkNZDHP/fishter
